title: Ep. 32 :: Why China Holds the Key to Our Future
itunes:title: Why China Holds the Key to Our Future
description: ​Andrew Horowitz from The Disciplined Investor Podcast breaks down China and the latest economic data in the U.S. Also, he gives us his favorite stocks to buy right now. Then, Dr. David Eifrig, editor of the S&A Retirement Millionaire newsletter, talks 401k's, deflation, and his five best income plays.
